data.title: Locations in New York City - MRI, Mammography & More
data.meta_description: Lenox Hill Radiology has 78+ locations across Manhattan, Brooklyn, Queens, Bronx, Staten Island, Long Island, and Westchester, as well as affiliated centers in Rockland and Orange Counties.
data.text:
New York City Radiology Locations

With multiple imaging centers throughout the New York metropolitan area, our network of locations offers convenience, affordability, and quality care. We are located in all 5 boroughs â€“ Manhattan, The Bronx, Brooklyn, Queens, and Staten Island. You can also find locations on Long Island, Rockland, Westchester, and Orange Counties.

With leading-edge imaging technologies, a compassionate staff, and board-certified, sub-specialized radiologists, Lenox Hill Radiology (LHR) is committed to providing our community with a high-quality radiology experience. For your convenience our centers are located near major bus lines, trains, and the subway or have nearby parking lots for easy access. We also accept most major insurances for more affordability.
